/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. A few cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. In the distance, a large stadium looms, hinting at the city's love for sports and outdoor activities. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
